title: Yuuwaku: Sakaraenai Yokubou
sinopse:
1. Motto Oshiete♡ (Teach Me More) [Shinjou Mayu]
   2-4. Oikakete →4Me (Chase 4Me) [Ibuki Kaede]
2. Natsu no Jin! Hatsu Date Ippatsu Shoubu (The Frontline of Summer! A First Date Victory-or-Defeat Charge) [Fujiwara Natsu]
3. Ka-ge-ki ni Renai Kakumei (Radical Love Revolution) [Sara Mahiro]
4. Migite no Bonnou Watashi no Kodou (The Desires of My Right Hand, the Beating of My Heart) [Ayukawa Mio]
5. Sepia-iro no Misshitsu (Sepia-colored Secret Room) [Amami Harushiro]
